ctx: intros f g x y H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R g : R -> R -> R x, y : R eps, d2 : posreal Hd2 : forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < d2 -> Rabs (v - y) < d2 -> Rabs (g u v - g x y) < pos_div_2 eps The term "d1" has type "Differential -> R -> R" while it is expected to have type "R".

ctx: intros f g x y H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: intros x0 y0 H3 H4 H5 H6.

original: intros f g x y H1 H2. unfold continuity_2d_pt in *. intros eps. specialize (H1 eps). specialize (H2 (pos_div_2 eps)). destruct H1 as [d1 Hd1]. destruct H2 as [d2 Hd2]. exists (Rmin d1 d2). intros x0 y0 H3 H4 H5 H6. apply Hd1; auto. apply Hd2; auto.
